sentence: Stephen Colbert mocked Republican Mehmet Oz’s run for senator of Pennsylvania, given the celebrity physician’s “tenuous” links to the state and his reported underperforming in straw polls on the race.
author: Lee Moran
title: Stephen Colbert Tells Mehmet Oz Exactly Where To Stick His Senate Campaign

sentence: Stephen Colbert offered a “miracle” cure to Dr. Mehmet Oz for his not-so-great Pennsylvania Senate-run poll numbers: a supplement that “makes you more likable and electable while reducing belly fat.” “Why is Dr. Oz losing so badly?” Colbert, asked Friday night in his “The Late Show” monologue.
author: Harper Lambert
title: Stephen Colbert Has a ‘Miracle’ Cure for Dr. Oz’s Shaky Senate Campaign That’s Rather Tough to Swallow (Video)

sentence: However, pseudo-science TV host and noted quack Dr. Mehmet Oz is a pretty close second, which clearly explains why Trump endorsed his run for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Michael Hayne
title: Endorse This: Colbert Hilariously Explains Why Trump Endorsed Dr. Oz (VIDEO)
